description.narrative: The corona virus has affected the communities especially in the markets and business premises people do not observe social distancing and other preventive measures of washing hands, wearing of face masks etc. this has created the fear that the virus mayEscalate in the area and this calls for sanitization of the population in the target operation areas. # Psychologically, many of the people in Ocea Quarantine center have been affected and this has caused trauma and stress. Since most of them have left their families without any support. # The rampant and uncontrolled movement of the people within the target area makes it hard to identify a victim of Covid-19. With this state of situation, there is high chance of transmission to other community membersin case of any infection. # During food distributions, it has also been observed that social distancing and other Covid 19 measures put in -place most at times are not observed. People use the same facilities like benches, chairs and this could easily applaud the spread of the virus in case ofany infection. # Some of the water points in the target area do not have hand washing facilities hence a risk to the community. So, the fact that in some of the water points there are no detergents available foruse by the those who come to fetch. # Inaccessible information and communication mean that persons with visual, intellectual or physical disabilities are not receiving key informationabout prevention and assistance relating to COVID-19. # Persons withdisabilities are facing barriers to access essential health services and WASH facilities due to environmental barriers; lack of accessible public transit systems; limited number of health workersto communicate and work with persons with disabilities in Oceaand Eden zones. # Limited information channels that can be accessed by persons with disabilities. For example, many persons with disabilities have lower levels of access to social media and other technology-based platforms. # Person with disabilities are disproportionately represented among older population who are known to be at increased risk in the COVID-19 pandemic according to scientific studies. This increase the rate of trauma among older population in fear of health risk and death.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Novib is one of the 17 national affiliates of the Oxfam International Confederation. It started life in 1956 as the Netherlands Organisation for International Assistance (Novib), and joined forces with Oxfam in 1994. Working together in confederation, the Oxfam affiliates can speak with one clear and compelling voice on issues of global concern: climate change, health and education forall, agriculture, trade, and conflicts and emergencies. Oxfam established this country office to support local organizations and projects. Through this local office Oxfam Novib directly contributes towards this project’s implementation.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands
